Package com.gcep.data

Interface ListsDataServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ListsDataService
public interface ListsDataServiceInterface
Provides the outline of methods for various operations performed with shopping list data.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gabriel Cepleanu

  • Method Details

    • getListById

      ListModel getListById(int id)
      Returns a shopping list with the given ID
      Parameters:
      id - The List ID
      Returns:
      List information

    • getListsByUser

      List<ListModel> getListsByUser(int user_id)
      Returns a list of all shopping lists from the given user ID
      Parameters:
      user_id - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      List of Shopping Lists

    • createList

      int createList(ListModel list)
      Adds a new list to the system. Does not affect list items.
      Parameters:
      list - The new shopping list
      Returns:
      Status of operation. If 1, operation was successful.

    • updateList

      ListModel updateList(ListModel updated)
      Updates an existing list in the system. Does not affect list items.
      Parameters:
      updated - The updated shopping list
      Returns:
      If successful, updated ListModel is returned.

    • deleteListById

      int deleteListById(int id)
      Removes a shopping list with the given list ID
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the list
      Returns:
      Status of operation. If 1, operation was successful.

    • addListItem

      int addListItem(int list_id, ItemModel item)
      Adds a new item to a shopping list.
      Parameters:
      list_id - The ID number of the list to append to.
      item - The item information
      Returns:
      Status of operation. If 1, operation was successful.

    • editListItem

      ItemModel editListItem(ItemModel updated)
      Updates an existing item.
      Parameters:
      updated - The updated item information
      Returns:
      If successful, updated ItemModel is returned.

    • deleteListItem

      int deleteListItem(int id)
      Deletes an item from a shopping list.
      Parameters:
      id - List Item ID number of the item to remove
      Returns:
      Status of operation. If 1, operation was successful.

    • deleteCustomListItem

      int deleteCustomListItem(int id)
      Deletes a custom list item from a shopping list.
      Parameters:
      id - Custom List Item ID number of the item to remove
      Returns:
      Status of operation. If 1, operation was successful.

    • getListItemDetails

      ListItemModel getListItemDetails(int list_item_id, boolean noItemsService)
      Gets a single list item information with the specified ID
      Parameters:
      list_item_id - ID number of the list item entry
      noItemsService - If true, disable getting the item name
      Returns:
      List Item object

    • getCustomListItemDetails

      CustomListItemModel getCustomListItemDetails(int custom_item_id)
      Gets a single custom list item information with the specified ID
      Parameters:
      custom_item_id - ID number of the custom list item entry
      Returns:
      Custom List Item object

    • mergeRecipeItemsWithList

      int mergeRecipeItemsWithList(int list_id, RecipeModel recipe)
      Combines items from a recipe into a specified shopping list without duplicates.
      Parameters:
      list_id - ID number of the list
      recipe_id - ID number of the recipe
      Returns:
      Status of operation. If 1, operation was successful.
